Description.string: The Rational Method resource represents the Rational Method hydrologic model used to calculate peak discharge.

### RationalMethod Site Resources
Returns a dictionary of input and output parameters related to the Rational Method equation.
The Rational Method resource represents the TR55 hydrologic model used to calculate peak discharge.

### TR55 Site Resources
Returns a dictionary of input and output parameters related to the TR55 equation.

### TR55 Site Resources
Returns an unsorted dictionary of time steps (as percent) and associated input and output parameters related to the TR55 equation.

precipint.Description: Precipitation intensity, in inches per hour
